data.name: DiRT Rally 2.0 - Ford RS200 Evolution
data.detailed_description: The Ford RS200 never had the opportunity to shine in Group B rally, this changed however when the car was entered into its first European Rallycross Championship event, with the car demonstrating incredible performance characteristics, winning multiple events between 1986-1992, and winning the championship in 1991. Typically producing around 580 hp, the RS200 could accelerate from 0-60 in little over 2 seconds.
data.about_the_game: The Ford RS200 never had the opportunity to shine in Group B rally, this changed however when the car was entered into its first European Rallycross Championship event, with the car demonstrating incredible performance characteristics, winning multiple events between 1986-1992, and winning the championship in 1991. Typically producing around 580 hp, the RS200 could accelerate from 0-60 in little over 2 seconds.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit versions of Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD FX4300 or Intel Core i3 2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD7750 or NVIDIA GTX650Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible soundcard
